in an all IP Network ABOUT Integral Access Integral Access Inc provides multiservice packetbased access network systems under the PurePacket brand that enable carriers to offer differentiated services and combine voicedata on new generation IPbased networks as well as traditional circuit switched infrastructures The companys products are deployed by carriers in North America and Europe Integral Access is based in Chelmsford Massachusetts and is privately held To contact Integral Access call visit us on the Web at or mailto ABOUT PurePacket The PurePacket integrated access system enables carriers to deliver all services over a single network using virtually any transport media including copper pairs xDSL leased lines and Fiber links It is the first and only percent packetbased access network solution that uses an MPLSbased fabric to place network intelligence at the customer premise and make connectionless networks behave like their connectionoriented predecessors PurePacket is composed of PurePacketOUTburst customer premise Integrated Access Devices IADs PurePacketNode carrier network aggregation devices for central offices colocations points of presence PurePacketCompact for multitenant units MTU and the PurePacketOMS software which provides networkelement control and services management SUBSCRIBE AND UNSUBSCRIBE SUBSCRIBE Online To the Integral Access Newsletter at
